dataFormatConversion.invalidCsvData: CSV format only supports an array of objects with primitive values. Nested objects or arrays are not supported.
dataFormatConversion.invalidIniData: INI format only supports flat key-value pairs or arrays of primitive values. Nested objects are not supported.
dataFormatConversion.invalidTomlData: TOML format only supports objects with string keys and primitive or nested object values. Arrays or primitive top-level values are not supported.
dataFormatConversion.invalidXmlData: XML format only supports objects as root. Nested arrays or primitives as root are not supported.
